programme.desc: The BAU is called to Taos in New Mexico in order to investigate an UnSub, who is targeting his victims temporal lobes.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawaii
programme.desc: While Jane investigates Maggies kidnapping, shes shocked when she learns the truth and enlists her team and Whistler to prove her findings.

programme.title: The Read
programme.desc: Bradford-born actor Vinette Robinson gives a spellbinding performance as she narrates Emily Brontës groundbreaking novel. The much-loved work stands as a timeless classic, set against the haunting backdrop of the Yorkshire moors and seen through the eyes of housekeeper Nelly Dean.

programme.title: This Is BBC Four
programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: Pop Go the Sixties
programme.desc: A Whiter Shade of Pale by Procul Harum was one of the Sixties most popular and most played songs. Its performed here by the group who first recorded it, on Top of the Pops in 1967.

programme.title: White Christmas
programme.desc: Two army buddies who have become entertainers travel to a Vermont ski resort for a well-earned rest. However, on arrival they find the resort - run by their old army commander - in need of a helping hand. Theres only one answer - put on a show.

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Tearjerker about the friendship between two women - a streetwise New Yorker and a blue-blooded San Franciscan - who first met in childhood on the beach in Atlantic City.

programme.title: Imagine...
programme.sub-title: Bette Midler: The Divine Miss M
programme.desc: For five decades The Divine Miss M has forged a path which has taken her from a pineapple canning factory in Honolulu to becoming a Hollywood legend. Alan Yentob joins her to revisit the places and influences on her spectacular career.

programme.title: The Many Primes of Muriel Spark
programme.desc: Kirsty Wark celebrates the extraordinary life and work of Scottish writer Dame Muriel Spark, author of `The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie and one of the 20th centurys most enigmatic cultural figures.

programme.title: Close to Vermeer
programme.desc: Documentary following renowned Vermeer expert Gregor Weber, curator at the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam, as he sets up the largest ever Vermeer exhibition. Weber joins a number of Vermeer enthusiasts and experts who are using the latest techniques to search for what makes a Vermeer truly a Vermeer. New discoveries and passionate opinions are still capable of rousing the emotions.

programme.title: Concorde: A Supersonic Story
programme.desc: The life of the most glamorous plane ever built, told by the people whose lives she touched. On the eve of the opening of Bristols aerospace museum, a cast of engineers, flight technicians and frequent fliers tell the supersonic story.

programme.title: Scam City: Money, Mayhem and Maseratis
programme.desc: Award-winning journalist Mobeen Azhar investigates the story of Gurvin Singh, a 20-year-old medical student who one evening near Christmas decided to hand out free cash to unsuspecting strangers in Plymouth town centre. He told the local paper that he was `giving back to the community, having made thousands of pounds through forex trading. But weeks later rumours were rife that Gurvins trading claims were a scam.

programme.title: Scam City: Money, Mayhem and Maseratis
programme.desc: Having tried to make contact with Mr Gurvz, as hes known online, Mobeen is blocked from his social media accounts and forced to turn to more traditional methods in hunting him down. On the other side of the city, a tip-off leads him to a South London community group who were also involved in a forex investment.

programme.title: Dog Squad

She is trained to use her supersight to help Dr Amit do as many things as he can by himself. Together, they make the best team! Dr Amit has a very important letter to post. But first, he and Kika need to buy a stamp at the shop in time to catch the last post.

But where is Panda? And why are some creatures really tricky to find? Its time for a Gran Gran plan to help the Nature Club find all of the creatures on their lists, especially the hard-to-spot woodpecker. Can JoJo also help Gran Gran find her missing scarf with the magnifying glass?

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Princess Leia Fantasy

programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Dave Turins Lost Mine
programme.desc: With Dave home for his fathers memorial, Team Turin makes a promise to hit it big in his honour. But with the Bank Cut running out, Jason must think outside the box to find new ground and keep them on the gold.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

He was a gift from her beloved grandmother, who helped to raise her, and Wol is constant reminder of her grandmothers love. But the decades of hugs and kisses have rather worn out Wol, and he could really do with the expert care of bear ladies Amanda and Julie. Musical maestro David Burville welcomes Kathryn Freeman from Hertfordshire. He is excited to get his healing hands on her familys miniature piano, which is now in a sorry state. programme.desc: Henry Cole and Sam Lovegrove are in the New Forest, looking for things to buy, restore and sell for profit. Today they meet Stumpie, an Americana fanatic whose sheds are full of rare bicycles, classic sportsters and pimped up saloon cars.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Steve ODonnell from Galway in Ireland has a much-loved childhood gift that requires the mechanical expertise of Steve Fletcher, and a team effort is called for when Emma Sadek from London arrives at the barn with a Victorian automaton.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A 1960s record player and a flamboyant pair of 1970s boots are given a new lease of life. Plus, a painting by artist Helene de Beauvoir, sister of French philosopher Simone de Beauvoir, is lovingly restored.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.sub-title: Decorations on Mardi Gras Floats; Rock Candy
programme.desc: How do they build a float for New Orleans Mardi Gras parades? Plus, how do they stir, stretch and pull sugar to make rock candy?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: The miraculous feats of engineering that underpin our lives, from the most basic of everyday objects to the biggest and most complex. This episode focuses on crash helmets, rubber, and wave piercing.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: A look at how a classic British bike is being rebooted in India, how radiation is used to beat art fraud, and the amazing scale and technology inside Europes largest dairy plant.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.sub-title: Crash-Testing Cars; Expensive Dutch Tableware; High-End Hand-Made Pocket-Size Umbrellas
programme.desc: A look at the life-saving science behind crash-testing cars, how expensive Dutch tableware is made, and how high-end, hand-made pocket-sized umbrellas are produced.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Car legends Mike Brewer and Edd China are taking the biggest risk of their car careers. Theyre opening shop in the extremely competitive West Coast of America.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike enlists Edds help to make this 70s hatchback cool again. But with a limited budget and some wacky ideas, are they en route for a profit?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Salvage supremo Drew Pritchard visits a historic hop farm in Kent, and discovers some unexpected finds amongst the cobwebs. Plus, hell get a touch of Hollywood glamour.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew visits one of his favourite ever houses and discovers a design classic. Later, he visits a museum in a giant windmill, will it be a wasted trip or will he be blown away?

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea
programme.desc: Michelle Ackerley helps a couple who want to move back to the UK from the Algarve in time for their son to start secondary school. They hope that their budget of £800,000 will suffice.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its the penultimate leg for antique hunters Anita Manning and David Harper. Starting in Northumberland, England and crossing the boarder into Scotland, they search for hidden gems before heading to auction in Kinbuck, Stirlingshire.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew heads to an antiques shop in Edinburgh on a hunt for new stock and on an expedition to a 750-year-old house, he discovers an item that takes him out of his comfort zone.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: When architectural salvage hunter Drew Pritchard, and his sidekick Tee, get access to a recently-closed department store, he faces a potentially almighty shopping spree.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Top salvage expert Drew Pritchard breaks new ground with his first ever buying trip to Northern Ireland, where he gets trollied and falls for a vintage Japanese beauty.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Cantering towards an auction in Newmarket, Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw are taking their classic car around Norfolk and Suffolk on an antiques hunt. The experts rummage far and wide, unearthing such objects as Ottoman militaria and a vital bit of old train.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team restores a childs chair, a musical wedding album and a mechanical, camel-shaped childrens ride weathered by a lifetime spent beside the sea.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team restore a whistling wooden statue, a photographers dark-room timer and an owl inkwell.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: After a successful day of salvaging at the recycling centre in Woking, upcycling expert Sarah Moore hopes to generate profits from three hidden gems saved from the skip. To help her on her way, Sarah turns to blacksmith Kev Paxton to come up with a creative new use for some metal ladders, while upholsterer Simion Hawtin-Smith tackles a small armchair. Sarah takes on the ambitious project of restyling a bed frame, but will all her hard work pay off?

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell revisit some of the families that have been reunited. To explore the challenging, unexpected and emotional developments as new relationships are built.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Roo Irvine and David Harper are driving around Yorkshire and Country Durham in a noisy and sporty 1960s motor, seeking out antiques to sell at auction. David buys an old fishing stool in the hope of landing a big profit at the Newcastle auction. However, the joke may be on Roo, who splashes out on an unusual purchase of a parachuting clown. A detour from the antiques emporia of York sees David discover a little-known 19th-century inventor whose incredible innovations are still relevant today.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques aficionados Roo Irvine and David Harper are on the third leg of their road trip, cruising around the north west in their trusty chariot, a replica 1960s AC Cobra. When David finds a carved cat at the bargain price of a pound, hes confident it will make a purr-fect profit at the Dundee auction. He also takes a journey back in time to discover the horrifying environment of the workhouses that were once prevalent across the country.

programme.title: Game of Thrones

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: A tormented father makes vengeance his lifes mission after his son is caught in a gangs crossfire and dies on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is trying to live a quiet, honest life in a small Appalachian town. When a vicious crime boss forces him back into her services, he soon learns hes capable of anything to protect his family and his home.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when Y2K becomes a reality.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when Y2K becomes a reality.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The days leading up to the tragedy of President John F. Kennedys assassination and its immediate aftermath are chronicled as they were experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The days leading up to the tragedy of President John F. Kennedys assassination and its immediate aftermath are chronicled as they were experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Schindlers List

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger rides into a small frontier town in the American southwest, provoked into a gunfight in which he kills three men, and then begged by the townsfolk to become sheriff. The residents are terrified of the gunslinger but live in greater fear of a gang which intends to wipe out the whole town.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An embittered Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteaders wife and her son back to safety after her cowardly husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, the scout stays on to help for a while and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: Blake Edwards bittersweet tale about the seemingly air-headed elegant socialite Holly Golightly whose façade hides pain and loss, and Paul Varjak, a blocked writer with his own dark secrets who falls for her. As their Manhattan-based romance progresses, one of them will end up heartbroken.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protege hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teen and his new stepfather find an island of secrets, strange life forms and gold after they answer a coded distress signal.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder, mad scientist Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Rocksteady and the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: As humanity picks up the pieces after an epic battle, a shadowy group emerges to gain control of history. Meanwhile, a powerful new menace sets its sights on Earth.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.desc: As humanity picks up the pieces after an epic battle, a shadowy group emerges to gain control of history. Meanwhile, a powerful new menace sets its sights on Earth.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder, mad scientist Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Rocksteady and the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway turns bloody and violent when a subservient android thats built for human companionship goes haywire.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A young writer travels to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by a cult of sycophants and intoxicated journalists, she soon finds herself in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: Violet is a widowed mother who goes to a restaurant to meet Henry, her charming and handsome date. However, she soon receives phone messages from a mysterious, hooded figure who threatens to kill her young son and sister unless she kills Henry.

programme.desc: Ramona becomes crippled by grief after the death of her husband, leaving her to care for her two children alone in her farmhouse. Her sadness soon turns to fear when a spectral woman in black appears on her front lawn, warning her "todays the day."

programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Elf

programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCalls mysterious past cuts especially close to home when thugs kill Susan Plummer, his best friend and former colleague. Now out for revenge, McCall must take on a crew of highly trained assassins who will stop at nothing to destroy him.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

programme.title: Snapped
programme.desc: An early morning apartment fire in Fort Worth, Texas, sparks a murder investigation when a young womans body is found beaten and bound inside. Detectives quickly work to solve the case and uncover an elaborate plot fuelled by revenge and greed.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching the Killer
programme.desc: In 1975, 11-year-old schoolgirl Lesley Molseed went to the shops and never returned to her family home in West Yorkshire. The ensuing police investigation led to a tragic miscarriage of justice before DNA evidence identified the true killer.

programme.title: Killer In My Village
programme.desc: The story of 22-year-old Emma Baum, who was savagely battered to death by her ex-boyfriend David Davies in a row over access to their child.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: The case of the cannibal cop killer, Stefano Brizzi, who murdered and consumed part of a police officer he met through a dating app.

programme.title: Forced Out

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: For Lisa, the hustle is real; Ivy and Pops drop by on their way home from holiday and end up schooling the other buyers; Dave comes out swinging but ends up just playing games; Brandi and Cameron almost take their profits sky high.

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori try to win valuable lots at auction. Sean uncovers a bin which has been used for a big prank while Jesse forges controversial allegiances.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Things get scary, when a seller comes in with a letter from Stephen King; Chum gets a sweet lesson when he checks out signed Steve Aoki merchandise; Corey pays lip service to a Harrison family tradition when a James Bond poster comes in.

programme.desc: A banner from the WWII secret airborne division is brought into the shop, a customer brings in a 1980s Ooze-It toy, and Rick is muted by an unsigned illustration from the silent film era.

programme.desc: Barry believes all the whales are coming to the big auction in Fullerton as he takes Dusty under his wing to test him. Rene makes some dainty discoveries, and Darrells tool locker becomes quite eye-opening.

programme.desc: Lancaster turns into Ivys honeypot, so everyone had better watch out or they might get stung; Lisa plans to use her brain when selecting lockers; Dusty and Tollbooth Lupe do a mitzvah.

programme.desc: The buyers head to Palm Springs in search of higher-end goods. Kenny tries to amp up the profit on an otherwise unimpressive unit; Rene sees quick potential where others dont. Brandi and Bozek try to keep their gains from squirming away.

programme.desc: While preparing for the Spooky Party, Pufferty is scared by his own reflection and races off into the woods. The twins go after but must conquer their own fears to bring him back in time!

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Baby Bison
programme.desc: Alife and Charlie find a lost baby Bison, so they follow the clues to help her get home safely.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Tallulah the Toucan
programme.desc: Tallulah refuses to leave her nest without a red flower, as she thinks its bad luck. Can Adam help her overcome her fears?

programme.desc: Nigel offers to look after Herberts precious watermelon crop on ripening day.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Doris Precious Things
programme.desc: Doris is determined to build the biggest collection of interesting things in Africa, but she upsets the other animals when she takes things that they need.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Leopoldo the Llama
programme.desc: Leopoldo is fed up at always having to play everybody elses choice of games. He decides to climb a mountain on his own as nobody else wants to come with him. Everyone soon realised that perhaps it is more fun doing things with your friends after all.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Zed The Hero of Africa
programme.desc: The volcano is threatening to erupt but the animals are reluctant to leave their beautiful savannah home. Can anybody come to the rescue?

programme.desc: The team are forced to step in when the chimp introduction goes wrong and Ben is injured by the alpha male, orang-utan Hsiao-Quai struggles with her ever-growing son Kai, and the parks staff prepare to welcome another baby orang-utan into the fold.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Hananya shows that he is not so tough when it comes to needles, while four-month-old woolly monkey Paulo is being hand-reared by Mike and Alison. programme.desc: The team must make a big decision concerning the safety of one of the chimp groups when alpha male Hananya continues to exhibit violent behaviour. programme.desc: The first-ever Qatar Grand Prix arrives at the Losail International Circuit. A full night race, there will be just two events remaining on the 2021 calendar following its conclusion.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Losail International Circuit welcomes Formula 1 racing once more. Lewis Hamilton took the chequered flag in P1 here back in 2021.

programme.desc: For the sixth and final time this Formula 1 season, the drivers bolt for the chequered flag as Lusail International Circuit stages an F1 Sprint. (30.11)

programme.desc: A Texan who vows to live a reformed life after being released from prison is subsequently convicted of murder, despite insisting his innocence, so he uses forensic science from behind bars to try to prove his case.

programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway journey through north west England from Preston to Hebden Bridge reaches Greater Manchester, where Michael celebrates new beginnings for the nation in the years after the Second World War.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In the stalls of the Oldham Coliseum, the towns Victorian repertory theatre, Michael hears how the lifting of censorshop allowed theatres to stage risque productions from playwrights such as Tennessee Williams.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: From Wakefield, West Yorkshire, Michael visits the National Coal Mining Museum for England at Caphouse Colliery. He pauses to admire the tall spire of Wakefield Cathedral and its resident peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his post-war exploration of north west England in Bradford, Shipley and Hebden Bridge. In Centenary Square in Bradford, Michael encounters Bradfords literary giant JB Priestley, author of An Inspector Calls.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek navigates the dry stone walls of the Peak District to collect a very original 1988 Opel Manta, Dave handles a rare Ford Granada rally support vehicle, and Paul contends with a Hilux monster truck.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek takes a long drive in a 1960s bus that has had a life in the sun, Dave helps a collector trim his fleet of British classics by taking a Triumph TR7 convertible for auction, and Paul is confused by an agricultural Bonser truck.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Paris is freed but celebrations are premature. As Montgomerys Arnhem raid and the Polish uprising fail badly, it seems five years in the war is still not at an end.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team pay a second visit to Chatsworth House in Derbyshire, where the experts are kept busy as more family treasures are brought from miles around. Cameras hone in on a painting thought to be by Constable, but is it genuine? Plus, lost designs surface for exotic jewellery made by Cartier in the mid-20th century.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head for Blair Castle, near Pitlochry in Scotland, where the treasures include a chair once used by Einstein, a necklace made from stags teeth, and a rare and valuable watch with no hands.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo ventures deep underground onto Londons newest railway: the Elizabeth Line. Emerging into the sunshine in Bedford Square, he recalls the choking smogs which plagued the capital during the 1950s.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his rail exploration of the east of England, beginning with the seafront at Felixstowe, where in January 1953, the town was engulfed in the worst flooding to hit England in the 20th century.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves on his way to Grimsby to pick up an iconic 80s fast Ford, the Mk1 Fiesta XR2.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Auschwitz survivors and Himmlers SS adjutant contribute to this harrowing account of the most chilling and inhuman chapter of WWII.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head for Hampton Court Castle, near Leominster, where the treasures include an important record of the days of early photography, an exquisitely decorated and moving book painted by an invalid in Victorian days, and a grandads collection of jade turns out to be more valuable than previously thought.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team weigh anchor at the Britannia Royal Naval College in Dartmouth for another busy day of evaluations. Objects exciting the experts include a relic from HMS Victory, a mystery device once used to make explosions which has some of the officer cadets confused, and perhaps the largest piece made by Faberge ever seen on the show.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek travels to the Lancashire coast to pick up a rare 1972 Citroen SM, and Dave is on HQ duties and admires a Punto thats two decades old but has just 42 miles on the clock.

programme.desc: Auschwitz survivors and Himmlers SS adjutant contribute to this harrowing account of the most chilling and inhuman chapter of WWII.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Robbie sets out to explore the meandering waterways of inner city Birmingham including the Soho Loop and the Engine Arm Canal.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: A broken ankle provides Fletcher with a pleasant spell in the prison hospital. Fellow patient Blanco is convinced he is going to die, so he gives Fletcher a map showing where he buried an ill-gotten £8,000.

programme.desc: After marrying Kartik Goenka, Naira tries to manage her roles as a wife and daughter-in-law with equal aplomb, but she faces many challenges and struggles to overcome them.

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mothers promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa, a warmhearted homemaker, receives neglect and ridicule in return for lavishing her family with affection, but there comes a time when she finds the ones who truly appreciate her.

programme.title: Sampoorna
programme.desc: Mittis world crumbles when her husband is accused of harassment. As she faces public shame, deeper secrets emerge, forcing her to question everything she thought she knew.

programme.title: Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
programme.desc: Embracing love above all, strong-willed Saas-Bahus keep the Viranis together. But when conspirators try to create a rift, will their familial bond prevail?

programme.title: Maana Ke Hum Yaar Nahi
programme.desc: Strong-willed Khushis world revolves around her father, and she enters a marriage contract with Krishna, a conman, in order to save him.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Fate poses a threat to Sailees fairytale hopes by tying her in a lifelong bond with Sachin, an uncouth and emotionally scarred taxi driver who shuns the idea of romance and marriage.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Nanu Ki Jaanu
programme.desc: A land mafia agent tries to rescue a woman who met with an accident. The woman died but her ghost arrives in the agents apartment.

programme.title: The Aap To Aise Na
programme.desc: A girl from a rich family falls for an ordinary boy but her parents dont approve of her choice.

programme.title: Dil Dhadakne Do
programme.desc: On a cruise to celebrate their parents 30th wedding anniversary, a brother and sister deal with the impact of family considerations on their romantic lives.

programme.title: Ek Rishtaa: The Bond of Love
programme.desc: A large family encounter a crisis when disputes take place between the father and the son..

programme.title: Thank God
programme.desc: A real estate broker meets with an accident and wakes up in heaven, only to be informed by God that he must play a "Game of Life." If he manages to win, hell be sent back to Earth, but hell be sent to hell if he loses.

programme.title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
programme.desc: Ramkishen and his wife Mamta have three sons. Prem and Vinod have sweethearts in Preeti and Vivek marries Sangeeta. Since Vivek is Mamtas step-son, she plots to alienate him, but will she succeed?

programme.title: Julie
programme.desc: Julie, a young Anglo-Indian, decides to marry her Hindu boyfriend, but their parents all refuse to accept their engagement, and Julia fears that her past may be the cause.

programme.title: Hathkadi
programme.desc: Four teenage boys are falsely implicated on the charge of raping their classmate by a powerful politician in alliance with some corrupt police officials. In prison, a police officer recruits the boys and asks them to kidnap the minister.

programme.title: Vasudha
programme.desc: Vasudha, a cheerful maid, joins business leader Chandrikas home. Despite differing beliefs, she seeks Chandrikas approval and struggles to fit into her elite world.

programme.title: Tum Se Tum Tak
programme.desc: Anu, a kind 20-year-old, and Aryavardhan, a resolute 45-year-old businessman, defy societal norms and family resistance, overcoming struggles to demonstrate that love transcends age or boundaries.

programme.title: Ganga Mai Ki Betiyaan
programme.desc: Ganga Mai is a resilient woman who is deserted by her husband for not giving birth to a son. Refusing to bow to societal expectations, she devotes herself to raising her three daughters with unwavering strength, grace, and affection.
